title: Handcuffs for double-murder fugitive: ICT Police arrest wanted killer outside District Courts case
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 02 (APP): Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) Policeâ€™s Ramna police team arrested a proclaimed offender wanted in a double-murder case that took place outside the District Courts, while one person was also injured in the attack.

An official told APP on Sunday that the accused, Shahid Saeed, along with his accomplices, had opened indiscriminate fire outside the District Courts within the jurisdiction of Ramna Police Station, killing Tafseer Hussain Shah and Wajid on the spot and seriously injuring another citizen, Nazir Abbasi.

The official said the Ramna police team, using modern technical tools and scientific investigation, successfully traced and apprehended the fugitive.

Initial record revealed that the arrested accused has a criminal history and was already wanted in several cases registered in Rawalpindi and Islamabad.

SSP Operations Islamabad Muhammad Shoaib Khan stated that the suspect would be presented before the court with solid evidence to ensure exemplary punishment.

He said Islamabad Police are taking strict and indiscriminate action against criminals involved in heinous crimes to protect the lives and property of citizens.
